“\w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w will|strong="H8085"\w* \w show|strong="H2331"\w* \w you|strong="H2331"\w*, \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H5608"\w*; \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w which|strong="H2088"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w have|strong="H2088"\w* \w seen|strong="H2372"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w will|strong="H8085"\w* \w declare|strong="H5608"\w*

(which \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w men|strong="H2450"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* fathers, \w and|strong="H2450"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w hidden|strong="H3582"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w*;

\w to|strong="H5414"\w* whom alone \w the|strong="H5414"\w* land \w was|strong="H5414"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H5674"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w stranger|strong="H2114"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*):

\w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w man|strong="H7563"\w* \w writhes|strong="H2342"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w pain|strong="H2342"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, even \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w number|strong="H4557"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* laid \w up|strong="H6845"\w* \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w oppressor|strong="H6184"\w*.

\w Distress|strong="H6862"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w anguish|strong="H4691"\w* make \w him|strong="H4428"\w* \w afraid|strong="H1204"\w*. \w They|strong="H4428"\w* \w prevail|strong="H8630"\w* \w against|strong="H6862"\w* \w him|strong="H4428"\w*, \w as|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w ready|strong="H6264"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H4428"\w* \w battle|strong="H3593"\w*.

he \w runs|strong="H7323"\w* at him \w with|strong="H6677"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* stiff \w neck|strong="H6677"\w*, \w with|strong="H6677"\w* \w the|strong="H7323"\w* \w thick|strong="H5672"\w* \w shields|strong="H4043"\w* \w of|strong="H4043"\w* \w his|strong="H7323"\w* \w bucklers|strong="H4043"\w*,

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w company|strong="H5712"\w* \w of|strong="H5712"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w godless|strong="H2611"\w* \w will|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3588"\w* \w barren|strong="H1565"\w*, \w and|strong="H5712"\w* fire \w will|strong="H3588"\w* consume \w the|strong="H3588"\w* tents \w of|strong="H5712"\w* \w bribery|strong="H7810"\w*.

\w They|strong="H4820"\w* \w conceive|strong="H2029"\w* \w mischief|strong="H5999"\w* \w and|strong="H5999"\w* produce \w iniquity|strong="H5999"\w*. \w Their|strong="H3559"\w* heart \w prepares|strong="H3559"\w* \w deceit|strong="H4820"\w*.”
